nodes.text: You hold the bell clapper in your hands. Its surface is cold.
You can feel the weight of the sealed memory within it.

nodes.speaker: Companion
nodes.text: You can return it to the Elder. Re-seal the memory. Keep the peace.

nodes.speaker: Companion
nodes.text: Or you can break the seal. Let the truth be known. Whatever it is.

nodes.speaker: Companion
nodes.text: I trust you. Whatever you choose, I'll stand by you.

choices.text: Return the clapper to the Elder
Break the seal and free the memory

nodes.text: You decide to return the clapper. The past will remain buried.

nodes.speaker: Companion
nodes.text: ...I understand. Maybe some truths aren't meant to be shared.
You grasp the clapper firmly and break the seal. Light floods from within.

nodes.speaker: Companion
nodes.text: We'll face it together. We're stronger than they think.
